name: PENNANT
shortdesc: An unstructured mesh physics mini-app designed for advanced architecture research.
longdesc: PENNANT is an unstructured mesh physics mini-app designed for advanced architecture research.  It contains mesh data structures and a few physics algorithms adapted from the LANL rad-hydro code FLAG, and gives a sample of the typical memory access patterns of FLAG. Further documentation can be found in the 'doc' directory of the PENNANT distribution.
